### Notice Details

* **Title (Eng)**: Mail Tracking System
* **Title (Fra)**: Système de suivi du courrier
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive, Open Bidding

### Description

The Treasury Board Secretariat of Canada is seeking to lease a turn-key mail tracking system for a period of 4 years. The system must be capable of registering incoming mail, monitoring deliveries, producing barcodes (if required), and capturing final delivery data. 

Selected bidder must provide comprehensive system services including hardware, software, preventative and remedial maintenance, and ongoing software support without requiring access to the Treasury Board Secretariat’s network and internet infrastructure.

### Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the Lowest Price among eligible bidders.

### Contact Information

* Name: Dawn Dormer
* Email: [Dawn.Dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca](mailto:Dawn.Dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 542-8102
* Address: 90 Elgin Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0R5, Canada

### Attachments

Available tender documents, including the solicitation package, can be found at:
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4775...]()

### Trade Agreements and Regions

The procurement is open to bidders who are compliant with Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) rules. The selected bidder must be capable of delivering the system to Ottawa, Gatineau, or the National Capital Region (NCR).
